#labels Featured

<wiki:toc max_depth="3" /> 

= Methods =

== Available dumps ==
Currently, there are two dumps hosted on odylab-evedb:
  * Dominion 1.0.0: http://dom100.latest.odylab-evedb.appspot.com
  * Tyrannis 1.0.1: http://tyr101.latest.odylab-evedb.appspot.com

You can specify exact dump with URLs above, if none is specified the latest dump will be used.

== Summary ==

|| *Method* || *Parameter* || *Response* || *dom100* || *tyr101* || *Description* ||
|| /baseMaterialsForTypeID || /typeID || JSON || YES || YES || List of base materials for given item type id ||
|| /baseMaterialsForTypeName || /typeName || JSON || YES || YES || List of base materials for given item type name ||
|| /blueprintTypeByTypeID || /typeID || JSON || YES || YES || Blueprint information for given blueprint type id ||
|| /blueprintTypeByTypeName || /typeName || JSON || YES || YES || Blueprint information for given blueprint type name ||
|| /extraMaterialsForTypeID || /typeID || JSON || YES || YES || List of extra materials for given item type id ||
|| /extraMaterialsForTypeName || /typeName || JSON || YES || YES || List of extra materials for given item type id ||
|| /lookupBlueprintType || /partialTypeName || JSON || YES || YES || List of matching blueprint item types ||
|| /lookupResourceType || /partialTypeName || JSON || YES || YES || List of matching resource item types ||
|| /lookupType || /partialTypeName || JSON || YES || YES || List of matching any item types ||
|| /typeBasicInfoByTypeID || /typeID || JSON || YES || YES || Item type basic information for given type id ||
|| /typeBasicInfoByTypeName || /typeName || JSON || YES || YES || Item type basic information for given type name ||
|| /typeIdToTypeName || /typeName || TEXT || YES || YES || Convert item type id to name ||
|| /typeNameToTypeID || /typeID || TEXT || YES || YES || Convert item type name to id ||
|| /version || NONE || TEXT || YES || YES || Application version ||

== Method details ==

=== /baseMaterialsForTypeID and /baseMaterialsForTypeName ===

Retrieve list of base materials for given item type. Shows how much material is needed for construction or how much can be recovered after reprocessing.

==== Attributes ====

|| materialTypeID || Number ||
|| materialTypeName || String ||
|| materialTypeCategoryID || Number ||
|| quantity || Number ||
|| materialTypeGraphicIcon || String ||

==== Examples ====

[http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/baseMaterialsForTypeID/587 baseMaterialsForTypeID/587],
[http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/baseMaterialsForTypeName/Rifter baseMaterialsForTypeName/Rifter] (JSON)
{{{
[{"materialTypeID":34,"materialTypeName":"Tritanium","materialTypeCategoryID":4,"quantity":20524,"materialTypeGraphicIcon":"06_14"},
{"materialTypeID":35,"materialTypeName":"Pyerite","materialTypeCategoryID":4,"quantity":5529,"materialTypeGraphicIcon":"06_15"},
{"materialTypeID":36,"materialTypeName":"Mexallon","materialTypeCategoryID":4,"quantity":1841,"materialTypeGraphicIcon":"06_12"},
{"materialTypeID":37,"materialTypeName":"Isogen","materialTypeCategoryID":4,"quantity":317,"materialTypeGraphicIcon":"06_16"},
{"materialTypeID":38,"materialTypeName":"Nocxium","materialTypeCategoryID":4,"quantity":118,"materialTypeGraphicIcon":"11_09"},
{"materialTypeID":39,"materialTypeName":"Zydrine","materialTypeCategoryID":4,"quantity":13,"materialTypeGraphicIcon":"11_11"},
{"materialTypeID":40,"materialTypeName":"Megacyte","materialTypeCategoryID":4,"quantity":1,"materialTypeGraphicIcon":"11_10"}]
}}}

[http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/baseMaterialsForTypeID/1234567890 baseMaterialsForTypeID/1234567890], [http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/baseMaterialsForTypeName/blah-blah baseMaterialsForTypeName/blah-blah] (JSON)

[http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/baseMaterialsForTypeID/blah-blah baseMaterialsForTypeID/blah-blah] (HTTP 400)

=== /blueprintTypeByTypeID and /blueprintTypeByTypeName ===

Retrieve blueprint information. Contains information about produced item type, base waste factor and maximum production limit. Mainly used to determine what item is produced by given blueprint.

==== Attributes ====

|| blueprintTypeID || Number ||
|| blueprintTypeName || String ||
|| productTypeID || Number ||
|| productTypeName || String ||
|| productCategoryID || Number ||
|| productGraphicIcon || String ||
|| wasteFactor || Number ||
|| maxProductionLimit || Number ||

==== Examples ====

[http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/blueprintTypeByTypeID/20188 blueprintTypeByTypeID/20188], [http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/blueprintTypeByTypeName/Obelisk%20Blueprint blueprintTypeByTypeName/Obelisk%20Blueprint], [http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/blueprintTypeByTypeName/Obelisk+Blueprint blueprintTypeByTypeName/Obelisk+Blueprint] (JSON)
{{{
{"blueprintTypeID":20188,"blueprintTypeName":"Obelisk Blueprint","productTypeID":20187,"productTypeName":"Obelisk","productCategoryID":6,"productGraphicIcon":"","wasteFactor":10,"maxProductionLimit":1}
}}}

[http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/blueprintTypeByTypeID/1234567890 blueprintTypeByTypeID/1234567890], [http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/blueprintTypeByTypeName/blah-blha blueprintTypeByTypeName/blah-blah] (JSON)
{{{
[]
}}}

[http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/blueprintTypeByTypeID/blah-blah blueprintTypeByTypeID/blah-blah] (HTTP 400)

=== /extraMaterialsForTypeID and /extraMaterialsForTypeName ===

Retrieve list of additional materials for given item type. Such information include extra items required for construction, invention and research.

==== Attributes ====
         
|| activityID || Number ||
|| activityName || String ||
|| requiredTypeID || Number ||
|| requiredTypeName || String ||
|| requiredTypeCategoryID || Number ||
|| requiredTypeGroupID || String ||
|| requiredTypeGroupName || String ||
|| quantity || Number ||
|| damagePerJob || String ||
|| requiredTypeNameGraphicIcon || String ||

=== /lookupBlueprintType ===

Retrieve list of matching blueprint item types (categoryID=9) for given query. Subject to some limitations (see below).

==== Attributes ====

|| itemTypeID || Number ||
|| name || String ||
|| itemCategoryID || Number ||
|| graphicIcon || String ||

==== Limitations ====

  * Maximum 50 results (EveDb constraint)
  * Minimum 3 letters (EveDb constraint)
  * Only matches that begin with query string (AppEngine constraint)
  * Case-sensitive (AppEngine constraint)

==== Examples ====

[http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/lookupBlueprintType/Mega lookupBlueprintType/Mega] (JSON)
{{{
[{"itemTypeID":847,"itemCategoryID":9,"name":"Mega Beam Laser I Blueprint","graphicIcon":"13_11"},
{"itemTypeID":3050,"itemCategoryID":9,"name":"Mega Beam Laser II Blueprint","graphicIcon":"13_11"},
{"itemTypeID":30224,"itemCategoryID":9,"name":"Mega Module Blueprint","graphicIcon":"01_08"},
{"itemTypeID":846,"itemCategoryID":9,"name":"Mega Pulse Laser I Blueprint","graphicIcon":"13_15"},
{"itemTypeID":3058,"itemCategoryID":9,"name":"Mega Pulse Laser II Blueprint","graphicIcon":"13_15"},
{"itemTypeID":995,"itemCategoryID":9,"name":"Megathron Blueprint","graphicIcon":""},
{"itemTypeID":13203,"itemCategoryID":9,"name":"Megathron Federate Issue Blueprint","graphicIcon":""},
{"itemTypeID":17729,"itemCategoryID":9,"name":"Megathron Navy Issue Blueprint","graphicIcon":""}]
}}}

[http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/lookupBlueprintType/blah-blah lookupBlueprintType/blah-blah] (JSON)
{{{
[]
}}}

[http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/lookupBlueprintType/A lookupBlueprintType/A] (HTTP 400)

=== /lookupResourceType ===

Retrieves list of matching resource item types (categoryID=4) for given query. Subject to some limitations (see below).

==== Attributes ====

|| itemTypeID || Number ||
|| name || String ||
|| itemCategoryID || Number ||
|| graphicIcon || String ||

==== Limitations ====

  * Maximum 50 results (EveDb constraint)
  * Minimum 3 letters (EveDb constraint)
  * Only matches that begin with query string (AppEngine constraint)
  * Case-sensitive (AppEngine constraint)

==== Examples ====

[http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/lookupResourceType/Tri lookupResourceType/Tri] (JSON)
{{{
[{"itemTypeID":25612,"itemCategoryID":4,"name":"Trigger Unit","graphicIcon":"69_14"},
{"itemTypeID":25598,"itemCategoryID":4,"name":"Tripped Power Circuit","graphicIcon":"69_15"},
{"itemTypeID":34,"itemCategoryID":4,"name":"Tritanium","graphicIcon":"06_14"}]
}}}

[http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/lookupResourceType/blah-blah lookupResourceType/blah-blah] (JSON)
{{{
[]
}}}

[http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/lookupResourceType/A lookupResourceType/A] (HTTP 400)

=== /typeBasicInfoByTypeID /typeBasicInfoByTypeName ===

Retrieve item basic information, like type id, name, category and graphic icon. Can be used to compose image URLs.

==== Attributes ====

|| itemTypeID || Number ||
|| itemCategoryID || Number ||
|| name || String ||
|| graphicIcon || String ||

==== Examples ====

[http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/typeBasicInfoByTypeID/34 typeBasicInfoByTypeID/34], [http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/typeBasicInfoByTypeName/Tritanium typeBasicInfoByTypeName/Tritanium] (JSON)
{{{
{"itemTypeID":34,"itemCategoryID":4,"name":"Tritanium","graphicIcon":"06_14"}
}}}

[http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/typeBasicInfoByTypeID/1234567890 typeBasicInfoByTypeID/1234567890], [http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/typeBasicInfoByTypeID/blah-blah typeBasicInfoByTypeID/blah-blah] (HTTP 400)

=== /typeIdToTypeName ===

Convert item type id to name;

==== Examples ====

[http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/typeIdToTypeName/20187 typeIdToTypeName/20187] (TEXT)
{{{
Obelisk
}}}

[http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/typeIdToTypeName/1234567890 typeIdToTypeName/1234567890], [http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/typeIdToTypeName/blah-blah typeIdToTypeName/blah-blah] (HTTP 400)

=== /typeNameToTypeID ===

Convert item type name to id.

==== Examples ====

[http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/typeNameToTypeID/Obelisk typeNameToTypeID/Obelisk] (TEXT)
{{{
20187
}}}

[http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/typeNameToTypeID/Rifter%20Blueprint typeNameToTypeID/Rifter%20Blueprint], [http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/typeNameToTypeID/Rifter+Blueprint typeNameToTypeID/Rifter+Blueprint] (TEXT)
{{{
691
}}}

=== /version ===

Get application version. Can be used to determine dump version.

==== Examples ====

[http://odylab-evedb.appspot.com/version], [http://tyr101.latest.odylab-evedb.appspot.com/version] (TEXT)
{{{
1.3-tyr101
}}}

[http://dom100.latest.odylab-evedb.appspot.com/version] (TEXT)
{{{
1.3-dom100
}}}
